DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , placebo control study . Patients randomize treatment low dose intravenous immunoglobulin ( IVIg ) , high dose IVIg , placebo . Patients must first complete baseline evaluation . Patients receive IVIg placebo day 1 , 2 , 3 , 5 , biweekly week 2-4 , weekly week 5-8 , every week week 9-12 . Patients assess 6 , 12 , 36 , 52 , 104 week . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
